name: Object Retrieval

tasks.name: Locate Object
Instructions: Use sensors to scan the environment.
Identify the target object using object recognition.
Move towards the identified object.

tasks.name: Pick Up Object
Instructions: Position the robot's arm above the object.
Adjust the gripper to the size of the object.
Securely grip and lift the object.

tasks.name: Deliver Object
Instructions: Navigate to the designated drop-off area.
Position the robot arm to release the object.
Open the gripper and place the object down.

description: The robot is tasked with retrieving specific objects from different locations and delivering them to a designated area.

name: Surveillance Patrol

tasks.name: Initialize Patrol Route
Instructions: Upload the patrol route to the robot's system.
Set patrol schedule and frequency.
Start the initial patrol.

tasks.name: Monitor Environment
Instructions: Use sensors to continuously scan the surroundings.
Record and analyze data for any irregularities.
Alert the control center if any unusual activity is detected.

tasks.name: Return to Base
Instructions: Navigate back to the base station after each patrol.
Dock with the charging station.
Upload patrol data to the central system.

description: The robot is responsible for patrolling a specified area and reporting any unusual activities.

name: Inventory Management

tasks.name: Scan Inventory
Instructions: Move through the aisles scanning inventory items.
Record the location and quantity of each item.
Update the inventory database.

tasks.name: Organize Shelves
Instructions: Identify items that are out of place.
Use the robot arm to pick up and relocate items.
Ensure all items are properly labeled and stored.

tasks.name: Report Inventory Status
Instructions: Compile a report of the inventory status.
Highlight any discrepancies or low stock items.
Send the report to the warehouse manager.

description: The robot is tasked with managing and organizing inventory in a warehouse.

name: Delivery Service

tasks.name: Pick Up Package
Instructions: Navigate to the pick-up location.
Identify the package using QR code scanning.
Secure the package using the robot arm.

tasks.name: Transport Package
Instructions: Plan the optimal route to the delivery location.
Avoid obstacles and follow traffic rules.
Monitor package status during transit.

tasks.name: Deliver Package
Instructions: Confirm the delivery address.
Gently place the package at the designated spot.
Notify the recipient of the delivery.

description: The robot provides delivery services within a specified area, picking up and delivering packages.

name: Disaster Response

tasks.name: Search for Survivors
Instructions: Use sensors to scan for heat signatures.
Identify and mark the locations of potential survivors.
Communicate findings to the response team.

tasks.name: Provide Supplies
Instructions: Navigate to the supply depot.
Load essential supplies onto the robot.
Deliver supplies to the designated drop-off points.

tasks.name: Assess Damage
Instructions: Survey the disaster area.
Record and analyze the extent of the damage.
Report findings to the disaster management team.

description: The robot assists in disaster response operations, including search and rescue and providing essential supplies.
